pkgmetadata.longdescription: Age-Period-Cohort Analysis // Functions for age-period-cohort analysis. The data can be organised in matrices indexed by age- cohort, age-period or cohort-period. The data can include dose and response or just doses. The statistical model is a generalized linear model (GLM) allowing for 3,2,1 or 0 of the age-period-cohort factors. The canonical parametrisation of Kuang, Nielsen and Nielsen (2008) is used. Thus, the analysis does not rely on ad hoc identification.
